description: The shine and slickness of latex fetishwear is beautiful and addictive. Mistress Snow Mercy and Ingrid Mouth show you how to slip it on, shine it up, and care for it. From sensuous latex stockings, gloves and skirts, to captivating latex masks, discover the tips that will help you dress in a second skin.
title: Latex Fetish: Wearing, Care and Feeding
